Chiropractic treatments at Dr Salman Khan’s Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic can fix a multitude of painful medical conditions – from head to foot, literally.

Our chiropractic treatment centre utilises a range of chiropractic treatment techniques to provide a natural, drug-free solution to counter acute and chronic issues that can significantly damage quality of life.

Our non-invasive, holistic chiropractic therapy has earned Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic an impressive reputation among the Singapore community for long-lasting pain relief.

Dr Salman Khan is a fully-qualified Doctor of Chiropractic and an acknowledged researcher and innovator in his field.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.5″ max_width=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″][et_pb_testimonial author=”Joanna Koh” portrait_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Clinic-Testimonial-Joanna-Koh.jpg” quote_icon=”off” portrait_width=”110″ portrait_height=”110″ admin_label=”Testimonial – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ body_font_size=”18″ use_background_color=”off” use_background_color_gradient=”on” background_color_gradient_start=”#424242″ background_color_gradient_end=”#212121″ background_color_gradient_direction=”135deg” background_layout=”dark” custom_padding=”6%|6%|6%|6%|true|true” custom_padding_tablet=”6%|6%|6%|6%|true|true” custom_padding_phone=”” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” border_width_all_portrait=”3px” border_color_all_portrait=”#ffffff” box_shadow_style=”preset3″]

Dr Salman was recommended to me by a family friend. And I was told his kung-fu was very good.

True enough, I felt improvement every time I saw Dr Salman. And now, my ailments are all gone!

[/et_pb_testimonial][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”20px||16px||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-9px||-4px||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”-8px||-2px||false|false” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_position=”outside” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Opening – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font=”|700||on|||||” header_2_font_size=”40px” header_2_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_3_font=”|600|||||||” header_3_font_size=”34px” header_3_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_4_font=”|300|||||||” header_4_font_size=”34px” header_4_letter_spacing=”-1px” header_2_font_size_tablet=”36px” header_2_font_size_phone=”32px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_3_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_3_font_size_phone=”26px” header_3_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_4_font_size_tablet=”30px” header_4_font_size_phone=”26px” header_4_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop” header_5_font_size_tablet=”” header_5_font_size_phone=”” header_5_font_size_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Types of chiropractic treatment

The different types of chiropractic treatment we offer can ease pain and correct the underlying problem in all areas of the body, including the back, neck, head, muscles, limbs, joints, and nerves.

A key benefit of our chiropractic treatment is that it heals the whole person, not just the body part that hurts, thereby promoting both physical and mental wellbeing – with no potentially addictive medications or invasive methods such as surgery.

The results-oriented philosophy of our chiropractic centre also ensures you get fast pain relief as we fix the root of the problem to prevent further complications.

Our chiropractic treatments are effective because they focus on the link between the spine and the central nervous system, which is responsible for pain triggers throughout the body.

Treatments provided by Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic help many people with a range of debilitating conditions to get their life back on track.

Our treatments include:

  • Spinal adjustments to end back pain.
  • Massage for muscle spasms.
  • Therapies for tightness in the soft tissue that supports muscles.

Couldn’t quite decide if chiropractic suits you?
Let us help address your concerns.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”30px||30px||false|false”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”40px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”25px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”28px||||false|false” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Treatment-for-Back-Pain-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor treating patient for back pain” title_text=”Chiropractic Treatment for Back Pain” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Back pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/back-pain/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_enable_color__hover=”on” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Back pain is a leading cause of disability, and the single most common cause of lower back pain is a pulled or torn ligament and/or muscle.

Our upper and lower back pain treatment typically entails spinal manipulation to fix strained muscles and ligaments, herniated discs, and muscle spasms.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Hand-and-Wrist-Pain-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing patient hand and wrist pain treatment” title_text=”Hand and Wrist Pain Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”CTS & other hand and wrist pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/cts-hand-wrist-pains/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

We provide treatment of carpal tunnel syndrome (CTS) and other hand and wrist pains.

CTS occurs when the median nerve going into the hand from the neck becomes compressed. This and other wrist problems can be treated with:

  • Trigger point therapy – manual compression and stretching of tight areas of muscle tissue.
  • Manipulation of the muscles to improve flexibility and blood circulation.
[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Elbow-Pain-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing patient elbow pain treatment” title_text=”Elbow Pain Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Elbow pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/elbow-pain/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Our chiropractic elbow pain treatment provides relief in cases like tennis elbow, without having to resort to steroids, which may actually damage tendons.

Our treatments for elbow discomfort include myofascial release – massage that eases pain and restores mobility of the joint.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||54px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||33px||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Foot-Pain-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing patient foot pain treatment” title_text=”Foot Pain Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Heel & other foot pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/heel-foot-pains/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Our treatment of heel and other foot pains can resolve issues such as:

  • Plantar fasciitis.
  • Achilles tendonitis.
  • Difficulty walking.
  • Stiffness of the foot.
  • Swelling.

Dr Salman Khan can diagnose the underlying cause of your foot problem and use chiropractic adjustments to provide long-term relief in any part of your foot.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Hip-Pain-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing patient hip pain treatment” title_text=”Hip Pain Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Hip/pelvic pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/hip-pain/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Our hip pain treatment uses a variety of chiropractic manipulation techniques to ease discomfort caused by many medical conditions, including:

  • Arthritis.
  • Overuse.
  • Swelling after injury or illness.

Chiropractic manipulation is also effective for hip pain caused by sciatica, which can also affect your back and legs.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Treatment-for-Joint-Pain-and-Subluxation-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor treating patient for joint pain or subluxation” title_text=”Chiropractic Treatment for Joint Pain and Subluxation” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Joint pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/joint-pain/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Every one of your hundreds of joints can be prone to painful issues, especially as you get older, but the most problematic areas are:

  • Hip and lower back
  • Knees
  • Shoulders

By fixing spinal imbalance as well as treating the joints themselves, our joint pain treatment is highly effective in easing discomfort and restoring full mobility to joints.

Are you suffering from a pain?
Chiropractic may be just what you need to alleviate it.

Besides illness or injury, knee pain – and other discomfort in the legs – can be caused by issues in the spine, so Dr Salman Khan will not only examine your knee but also assess other areas of your body.

Our treatment of knee and other leg pains includes myofascial release and trigger point therapy.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractor-for-Headache-and-Migraine-Pain-Relief-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing patient headache or migraine pain relief” title_text=”Chiropractor for Headache and Migraine Pain Relief” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Migraine & other headache pain relief” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/migraine-headaches/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

It can be difficult to pinpoint the root cause of a headache but Dr Salman Khan is a skilled diagnostician, which makes his treatment of migraine and other headaches particularly effective.

Dr Salman Khan can typically relieve tension-based headaches – the most common type – with the direct thrust method of spinal manipulation.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Treatment-for-Neck-Pain.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor treating patient for neck pain” title_text=”Chiropractic Treatment for Neck Pain” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Neck pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/neck-pain/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Levels of neck pain can vary from mild to agonising, and the cause often lies in damaged or misaligned cervical vertebrae.

Our neck pain treatment includes:

  • Shockwave therapy with a probe that emits high-intensity sound waves to promote healing.
  • Cervical spine manipulation with a high-velocity, low-amplitude thrust of the hand.
[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Sciatica-Pain-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing sciatica pain treatment” title_text=”Sciatica Pain Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Sciatica & other nerve pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/sciatica-nerve-pains/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Without effective treatment, nerve problems like sciatica and a pinched nerve can lead to serious complications.

Our treatment of sciatica and other nerve pains fixes misalignment of hard and soft tissue to ease pressure on the nerve, and often involves correcting a herniated disc or muscle strain.

Spinal traction – painless spinal decompression therapy – is a particularly effective treatment for sciatica.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Care-for-Scoliosis-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Doctor providing chiropractic care for scoliosis” title_text=”Chiropractic Care for Scoliosis” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Scoliosis treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/scoliosis/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Our scoliosis treatment for back pain addresses the problem of irregular sideways curvature of the spine.

Dr Salman does this by using chiropractic techniques such as:

  • Activator method – applying a small spring-loaded instrument to the spine.
  • Gentle spinal traction – to relax muscles and move the spine into a more central position.
[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Shoulder-Pain-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor providing patient shoulder pain treatment” title_text=”Shoulder Pain Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Shoulder pain treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/shoulder-pain/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Dr Salman Khan’s shoulder pain treatment entails chiropractic adjustments to realign the joint and surrounding tissues. These procedures may involve:

  • The drop-piece technique – assisting the chiropractic thrust while minimising the force needed.
  • Trigger point therapy – finger-tip pressure to ease pain in muscles.
  • Manual manipulation – applied to joints and muscle tissue to relieve ligament stiffness.
[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_2,1_2″ make_equal=”on” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”700px” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”” use_custom_width=”on” custom_width_px=”700px”][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.6″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Chiropractic-Treatment-for-Spine-Pain-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Chiropractor treating patient for spine pain” title_text=”Chiropractic Treatment for Spine Pain” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Slipped disc treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/slipped-disc/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”21px” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Like scoliosis chiropractic therapy, our slipped disc treatment can help to prevent serious complications as well as relieve discomfort.

A slipped disc in the back can be treated by flexing the spine and stretching muscles to expand spaces between vertebrae.

Cervical distraction can treat a slipped disc in the neck by easing pressure on nerves.

[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.4.5″ custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”fade” animation_duration=”1200ms” border_radii=”on|3px|3px|3px|3px” box_shadow_style=”preset3″ custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_image src=”https://chiroclinic.sg/wp-content/uploads/Accident-Sports-Injury-Chiropractic-Treatment-1024×576.jpg” alt=”Doctor providing patient sports injury chiropractic treatment” title_text=”Accident, Sports Injury Chiropractic Treatment” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ border_width_bottom=”6px” border_color_bottom=”#bdbdbd”][/et_pb_image][et_pb_cta title=”Accident & sports injury treatment” button_url=”https://chiroclinic.sg/treatments/accident-sports-injuries/” button_text=”Learn more” _builder_version=”4.5.3″ header_level=”h3″ header_font=”|700||on|||||” header_font_size=”21px” body_ul_line_height=”1.8em” body_ol_line_height=”1.8em” background_enable_color=”off” custom_button=”on” button_text_size=”18px” button_text_color=”#7cb342″ button_bg_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_border_color=”#7cb342″ button_font=”|600|||||||” button_use_icon=”off” text_orientation=”left” background_layout=”light” custom_padding=”0px|20px|35px|20px|false|true” hover_enabled=”0″ button_text_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_text_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_border_color__hover=”#bdbdbd” button_border_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_bg_color__hover=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” button_bg_color__hover_enabled=”on|hover” button_rel=”off|off|on|off|off”]

Dr Salman Khan’s treatment of pain brought about by an accident or sports injury can avoid complications like long-term mobility problems.

Soft tissue damage responds well to:

  • Myofascial release – to improve blood flow and ease tightened muscles.
  • Active release technique – to relax muscle contraction and trigger points.
  • Shockwave therapy – to stimulate the body’s anti-inflammatory response.
[/et_pb_cta][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”3.22″ custom_padding=”1%|||”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ max_width=”700px” Why our patients choose us

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#7CB342″ divider_weight=”4″ admin_label=”Divider – Clinic” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ max_width=”80px” module_alignment=”center” height=”40px” animation_style=”fade” animation_direction=”bottom” global_module=”106″ saved_tabs=”all”][/et_pb_divider][et_pb_text ul_item_indent=”35px” ol_position=”outside” ol_item_indent=”35px” admin_label=”Text – Clinic – Back” _builder_version=”4.4.6″ ul_line_height=”1.8em” ol_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||||false|false” custom_margin_tablet=”-16px||||false|false” custom_margin_phone=”” custom_margin_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_padding=”15px||||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding_phone=”||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|desktop”]

Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic provides effective pain relief and quality care across the entire range of chiropractic treatments, benefiting patients of all ages for over 20 years.

Reasons people come to our clinic include:

  • Outstanding results and affordability – Dr Salman Khan will never push you into unnecessary treatment, and he utilises the most effective chiropractic techniques to provide pain relief as quickly as possible, avoiding extra expense for the patient.
  • Qualifications – Dr Salman Khan has a Doctorate of Chiropractic from a top US health sciences establishment.
  • The personal touch – Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic is a family-friendly chiropractic clinic, and your treatment plan will be tailored to your specific needs and goals.
  • Expert advice – Dr Salman Khan is happy to give you the benefit of his training and experience as a holistic chiro practitioner by offering advice on general health, including nutrition and exercise.

excerpt.rendered: Our Chiropractic TreatmentsThe scores of testimonials we’ve received is proof Dr Salman Khan‘s chiropractic treatment is effective. Chiropractic treatments at Dr Salman Khan’s Chiropractic Health and Wellness Clinic can fix a multitude of painful medical conditions – from head to foot, literally. Our chiropractic treatment centre utilises a range of chiropractic treatment techniques to provide a natural, drug-free solution to counter acute and […]
